dcterms:creator: Joao Carreira
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: Kinetics-400 is a large-scale action dataset that has about 300k videos of 400 classes. The training split (around 240k video samples) is used without any annotation as the pre-training dataset.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-400

dcterms:creator: Khurram Soomro
Amir Roshan Zamir
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: UCF101 contains 13K videos spanning 101 human action classes. The dataset is divided into 3 splits, and split 1 is used for pre-training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: UCF101

dcterms:creator: Hildegard Kuehne
Hueihan Jhuang
Est√≠baliz Garrote
Tomaso Poggio
Thomas Serre
dcterms:description: HMDB51 is a relatively small action recognition dataset, which consists of about 7k videos of 51 classes. Split 1 is used for downstream task evaluation.
dcterms:title: HMDB51
